overview: Julieta, 57, is the only female kutsero (driver of a horse-drawn carriage) in Cebu City, Philippines. She struggles between making a living for her remaining children as her husband is already dead and his son is in jail for being allegedly involved in illegal drugs. How can she, at her age, keep up with the difficulties and risks brought about by the pandemic?
title: Ang Pinanggang Anak ni Julieta
